sections.heading: 01|Veterans' guardianship law definitions
sections.text: Effective:October 1, 1953Latest Legislation:House Bill 1 - 100th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in sections5905.01to5905.19, inclusive, of the Revised Code:(A) "Person" means an individual, a partnership, a corporation, or an associati

sections.heading: 19, inclusive, of the Revised Code relating to surety bonds and the administration of estates of wards shall apply to all "income" and "estate," whether the guardian was appointed under such sections or under any other law of this state
sections.text: 19, inclusive, of the Revised Code relating to surety bonds and the administration of estates of wards shall apply to all "income" and "estate," whether the guardian was appointed under such sections or under any other law of this state.
